acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the University Library as a gift by the Division of State and Historical Research, United States Department of Agriculture in October, 1936.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Ledgers, daybooks, cashbooks, and journals of general merchandise stores located at Grape-on-Hunting Creek, Centreville, and Wiseville, Va., relating to the grain, potato, and lumber trade. Includes the firms of Drummond Bros., James Dix, John Y. Bagwell, Segar & Goffigon, and accounts for business in Baltimore, Md., and Washington, D.C.
